sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il va au travail en vélo électrique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He rides an electric bike to work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ferai de mon mieux pour t'aider.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I will try my best to help you.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait actuellement sa licence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is currently studying for his bachelor's degree.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a organisé un tirage au sort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company organized a lottery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est le logo de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the company logo.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle suit toujours les tendances de la mode.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She always follows fashion trends.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pierre précieuse est très précieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This gemstone is very precious.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez copier cet article.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please copy this article.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī zhāng gòuwù dān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une liste de courses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a shopping list.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 那位大爷每天早上锻炼身体。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà wèi dàye měitiān zǎoshang duànliàn shēntǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vieil homme fait de l'exercice tous les matins.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That elderly man exercises every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je garantis que j'arriverai à l'heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I guarantee I will arrive on time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants courent sur le terrain de sport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The students are running on the playground.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne te laisse pas distraire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't get distracted.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在比赛中发挥得很好。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài bǐsài zhōng fāhuī de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a bien performé pendant le match.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He performed well in the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā mǎi le yī liàng èrshǒu chē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a acheté une voiture d'occasion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He bought a second-hand car.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle aime la musique classique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She loves classical music.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez laisser un message vocal.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please leave a voice message.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn chènshān shì nánshì kuǎnshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chemise est un modèle pour hommes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This shirt is a men's style.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì jīmì xìnxī, qǐng bǎomì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une information confidentielle, veuillez la garder secrète.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is confidential information, please keep it secret.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les soldats défendent le pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The soldiers are defending the country.
